mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM GAMELIST WHERE ${type} LIKE '%'||#{sType}||'%'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM GAMELIST WHERE G_NAME LIKE '%'||#{gameName}||'%'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY G_IDX ASC) RNUM, G_IDX, G_NAME, G_ENAME, G_GENRE, G_COMPANY, G_SERVICE, G_PLATFORM, G_DATE, G_SCORE, G_IMG FROM GAMELIST WHERE G_NAME LIKE '%'||#{gameName}||'%' ORDER BY G_IDX ASC) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{pageNum} AND #{contentNum}
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT G_IDX, G_NAME, G_ENAME, G_GENRE, G_COMPANY, G_SERVICE, G_PLATFORM, G_DATE, G_SCORE, G_IMG FROM GAMELIST ORDER BY G_IDX ASC) WHERE G_IDX BETWEEN #{pageNum} AND #{contentNum}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY G_IDX ASC) RNUM, G_IDX, G_NAME, G_ENAME, G_GENRE, G_COMPANY, G_SERVICE, G_PLATFORM, G_DATE, G_SCORE, G_IMG FROM GAMELIST WHERE ${type} LIKE '%'||#{sType}||'%' ORDER BY G_IDX ASC) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{pageNum} AND #{contentNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GAMELIST (G_IDX, G_NAME, G_ENAME, G_GENRE, G_COMPANY, G_SERVICE, G_PLATFORM, G_DATE, G_SCORE, G_IMG) VALUES(GAME_N.NEXTVAL, #{g0}, #{ge0}, #{gr0}, #{cp0}, #{sv0}, #{pf0}, #{id0}, #{sc0}, #{im0})

INSERT INTO GAMELIST (G_IDX, G_NAME, G_ENAME, G_GENRE, G_SCORE, G_IMG, G_COMPANY, G_SERVICE, G_PLATFORM, G_DATE) VALUES(GAME_N.NEXTVAL, #{g1}, #{ge1}, #{gr1}, #{sc1}, #{im1}, #{cp1}, #{sv1}, #{pf1}, #{id1})
